tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Custom Image
tutorials.description: Create an ArgoCD custom image and push to OCIR

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Reserved Public IP
tutorials.description: Create a Reserved Public IP to expose ArgoCD UI

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a Confidential Application
tutorials.description: This is used to authenticate to ArgoCD UI using your OCI user

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Deploy the automation using Resource Manager
tutorials.description: This will create the infrastructure needed for ArgoCD

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Testing ArgoCD
tutorials.description: Test deployment on an OKE Cluster using ArgoCD

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Cleanup
tutorials.description: Destroy the resources created by Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
